name: Mario Island (demo)
description:
CONTROLS

you can edit in pc version

STORY this game is an alternative to yoshi island. Mario and the yoshi not been able to recover luigi and the population of yoshi has decreased and there are 3 eggs left ...

Computer version

- an animation at the start of the level -an animation in the score - Mario is sonic if he runs -no lag Browser version - no animation at the start of the level -no animation in the score -Mario is not sonic if he runs -lag
